Translations.Text: Nam'modeya, khanditavagiyu navu bacciduva mattu navu bahirangagolisuva ellavannu ninu balle. Bhumiyallagali akasadallagali yava vastuvu allahaninda adagiruvudilla
nanna mudi vayas'sinalli nanage isma'il mattu is'hak‌rannu dayapalisida allahanige ella prasansegalu. Khanditavagiyu nanna odeyanu prarthaneyannu keluvavanagiddane
nannodeya, nannannu hagu nanna santatigalannu namajh‌na palakaragi madu. Mattu nam'modeya, prarthaneyannu svikarisu
nam'modeya, vicaraneya dina nannannu, nanna tande tayiyannu mattu visvasigalannu ksamisu
akramigalu maduttiruva krtyagala kuritu allahanigenu tilidillavendu nivu bhavisabedi. Nijavagi avanu, kannugalu koraisuva ondu dinada tanaka avarige kalavakasa niduttiddane
andu avaru tam'ma talegalannu meletti oduttiruvaru, avara drstigalu avaredege maralalaravu mattu avara manas'sugalu tira hatasavagiruvavu

avara mele sikseyu banderaguva a dinada kuritu janarannu eccarisiri. Andu akramigalu heluvaru; nam'modeya, namage svalpa samayada mattige kalavakasavannu nidu. Navu ninna kareyannu svikarisuvevu mattu ninna dutarannu anusarisuvevu. (Avarige uttarasiguvudu;) ‘‘nimage antyave illavendu nivu i hinde ane hakuttiralillave?’’
